title: IVA – Intelligent Virtual Assistant
shortDesc: AI-powered desktop assistant combining generative AI with system automation.
details: IVA is a Windows-based assistant capable of executing system-level commands while answering complex queries using LLMs. It supports wake-word detection, voice interaction, and real-time information fetching.

title: Aurasnap – Smart Photo Management
shortDesc: AI-driven face recognition system for event photography automation.
details: Aurasnap automatically sorts event photos by recognizing faces, applies dynamic watermarks, and delivers albums to guests via WhatsApp, running entirely offline for privacy.

title: NeuroWall – DDoS Protection System
shortDesc: ML-based real-time DDoS detection and mitigation platform.
details: NeuroWall combines Isolation Forest and SVM to detect malicious traffic and logs attacks on a tamper-proof blockchain while maintaining high availability.

title: Pawfect Match – Pet Adoption System
shortDesc: Desktop application for managing pet adoption workflows.
details: Pawfect Match digitizes pet inventory, adoption records, billing, and customer management using an MVC architecture.

title: Gesture & Facial Meme Recognition
shortDesc: Real-time meme prediction using facial expressions and gestures.
details: This system analyzes temporal facial and hand landmark sequences to identify meme reactions using an LSTM-based deep learning model.
